He works as an employee in a private company for over eight hours, and at night studies in the university. This is why he is requesting a loan to pay for a course as a heavy equipment operator. 

Ramiro is determined to contribute to household expenses but needs more help with his education. Ramiro is in good health and is convinced that he can accomplish all that he has set out to do.

loans.use: o pay for a course as a heavy equipment operator.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es estudiante de la carrera de radiología, está dedicado al estudio, también a su trabajo y  a su familia.
Él con esfuerzo y dedicación está llegando a su meta de ser un profesional para mejorar sus ingresos y la de su familia así poder  llevar una vida digna.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Gustavo is studying towards a radiology degree. As well as studying, he works and looks after his family.

With hard work and dedication he is reaching his goal of becoming a working professional, in order to increase the income for him and his family so that they can have a decent quality of life.

He is asking for this loan in order to pay his university fees, so that he can continue his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Las Amigas Group

texts.es:
Las Amigas está formado por  20 integrantes, están  el  ciclo  14 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. El grupo lleva ese nombre ya que todas son amigas y vecinas del barrio, y se ayudan mutuamente.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Catalina  es una de las integrantes, es una mujer muy trabajadora, que se esfuerza todos los días para poder crecer y salir adelante, ella tiene una despensa y también tiene una peluquería en la que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar frutas, verduras, perfumes, artículos de primera necesidad, para poder surtir su despensa. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir y crecer en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
Las Amigas is formed by 20 members. They are in their 14th loan cycle of the women’s committee program where they all work and help each other to get ahead. The group receives that name since they are all friends and neighbors. 

One of the members is Catalina, a hardworking woman who makes an effort every day to grow and get ahead. She has a small grocery store and a hair salon where she works every day from an early hour. 

She is requesting this loan to buy fruits, vegetables, perfumes and staple products in order to supply her store. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting and that will allow her to continue with her business and keep making it grow.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, perfumes and staple products.

loans.name: Kholdor

texts.ru: Эту трудолюбивую сельскую женщину зовут Холдор. Она уроженка района А.Джоми, ей 53 года. Холдор многодетная мать, у нее трое сыновей и семеро дочерей. Холдор и ее дети являются членами дехканского хозяйства. В течение 4 лет их семья занимается выращиванием овощей и зерновых культур. Они трудятся на грядке с утра до вечера и затем плоды их трудов приносит им доход. Холдор всегда радуется когда получается хороший урожай. В данный момент ее семья проводит очередной посев и им не хаватают семена, минеральные удобрения и топливо. Чтобы закупить их, Холдор просит кредит. Она надеется получить поддержку, так как не хочет потерять источник дохода.
texts.en:
This hardworking village woman is called Kholdor. She is a native of the A. Jomi region. She is 53 years old. Kholdor is the mother of many children. She has three sons and seven daughters. Kholdor and her children are part of a dekhan farm. For a period of four years, their family has worked with growing vegetables and cereals. They work in the garden from morning to night and the fruits of their labor bring them income. 

Kholdor is always happy when they get a good harvest. Currently her family is doing the regular sowing, but they do not have enough seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. In order to purchase this, Kholdor requests a loan. She hopes to get support as she would not like to lose her source of income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Mairamkan

texts.ru: Майрамкан 47 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Майрамкан  средне-специальное образование, она повар. С 1994 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, мастер в своем деле. По хозяйству активно помогает вся семья. В хозяйстве Майрамкан есть 6 коров, 10 овец. Также земельный надел мерою 1,80 ГА, где она выращивает люцерну. Ежемесячная прибыль Майрамкан составляет 16,000 сом(KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 140,000 сом(KGS) на покупку 4 бычков. Доходы от кредита Майрамкан направит на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, что позволит в будущем оплатить обучение ее дочери в университете.
texts.en: Mairamkan is 47 years old, married and a mother of 2 children. Mairamkan has a specialized secondary education; she is a cook. She has been involved in animal husbandry and farming since 1994 and is an expert in her business. Her whole family actively helps her with the farm that now contains 6 cows and 10 sheep. Mairamkan also has 1.80 hectares of land, where she grows alfalfa. Mairamkan's monthly profit amounts to 16,000 som (KGS). In order to increase her livestock headcount, she requested a loan in the amount of 140,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 4 bulls. Mairamkan will use the earnings from the loan to develop her business further, which will allow her to pay for her daughter's university education in the future.

loans.use: to buy four bulls in order to increase her livestock headcount and save for her daughter's future university education

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy such items as new fishing nets, lead weights, and hooks

loans.name: Aizada

texts.ru: Айзада,58 лет, замужем, дети взрослые, самостоятельные. У Айзады- высшее образование, много лет работает учителем в школе. Благодаря упорному труду Айзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 2 лошади и 25 овец. Также имеется земельный надел, мерою 1,30 ГА, где Айзада выращивает ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дети и внуки в свободное время активно помогают по хозяйству. Совокупный ежемесячный доход Айзады составляет 25,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита позволят Айзаде развить ее бизнес, улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Aizada is 58 years old, married and has grown, independent children. Aizada has a college education and has been working as a school teacher for many years. Thanks to Aizada's hard work, today her farm contains 2 cows, 2 horses and 25 sheep. She also has a 1.30-hectare land plot, where she grows barley for the household use and sale. Her children and grandchildren actively help her with the business in their free time. Aizada's combined monthly income amounts to 25,000 som (KGS). She requested a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy a horse in order to increase her livestock headcount. The earnings from the loan will allow Aizada to develop her business and improve her family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy a horse in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Ruzigul

texts.ru: Рузигулу 49 лет. Она одна из уроженцев района Шахритус. Шахритус находиться на юго-западной части Таджикистана и является одной из самых теплых мест Республики. Рузигул жена и мать двоих детей. Она занимается растениеводством. Цель ее кредитования является ее деятельность. Она хочет посадить новый урожай, но из-за не достаточной суммы денег, есть угроза того что посев урожая не осуществится и она лишиться источника дохода. Она видит выход из положения только в получения кредита. Она сможет на заемные деньги купить семена и минеральные удобрения и завершить посев.
texts.en:
Ruzigul is 49 years old. She is a native of the Shahrituz region. Shahrituz is in the south-western part of Tajikistan and is one of the warmest places in the republic. 

Ruzigul is a wife and the mother of two children. She works with field crop cultivation. The purpose of her loan is her business; she would like to plant a new harvest. However, due to a lack of money, there is a danger that she will not realize her harvest and thus lose a source of income. 

Ruzigul can only see a way out through getting a loan. With the loan she will be able to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers and complete her sowing.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers and complete her sowing

loans.name: Mujeres Activas Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Mujeres Activas” es un comité de 17 mujeres que están muy bien consolidadas, trabajan y se ayudan mutuamente. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, y todas son vecinas. 
Maria, una de ellas es modista, es muy buena en lo que hace, es por ello que ya tiene muchos clientes, pues siempre gusta mucho los trabajos que hace. Ella es una persona muy luchadora y sacrificada que quiere crecer y salir adelante para poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas, hilos y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo, y así seguir creciendo por poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The group “Mujeres Activas” is a communal bank of 17 women who are very strong; they work and help each other.  These women are from the city of Villarrica and they are all neighbours.

Maria, one of the women, is a dressmaker.  She is very good at what she does, and because of that she has many customers; they always like the work she does.  She is a very tenacious and self-sacrificing person who wants to grow and move forward to be able to give to her family everything that she couldn't have.

She is asking for this loan to be able to buy fabric, thread, elastic and so on in order to be able to continue with her work and in this way be able to continue growing and moving forward.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, elastic, and so on

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es:
La vida le dio una oportunidad para trabajar como vendedora de cosméticos en la comunidad donde ella vive. Era lo que ella esperaba, no sólo una puerta abierta sino lo que estaba detrás de esa puerta. Y lo que encontró fue algo que definió lo que ella quería ser. De 69 años de edad mujer emprendedora y decidida a enfrentar la realidad de la vida.

La actividad productiva que Ana realiza es la compra y venta de cosméticos, ella decidió realizar esta actividad porque es rentable y hay pocas personas que realizan esta actividad en su comunidad, ella viene realizando dicha actividad desde hace 10 años y le ha dejado muy buena ganancia para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

El uso respectivo que ella dará al crédito gestionado es para la compra de productos de cosméticos ya que para ella es de mucha importancia para poder desempeñar su actividad de cada día ya que es el medio en la que ella puede tener un ingreso económico para el beneficio de su familia. 

Uno de las aspiraciones de ella es ahorrar para un futuro mejor en la vida, ella es un ejemplo a seguir ya que a pesar de su edad ella no se deja vencer por los obstáculos de la vida, ella también sueña con mejorar su vivienda para tener las condiciones de vida adecuada.
texts.en:
Life gave her an opportunity to work as a cosmetic salesperson in her community.  It was what she had hoped, not only this open door, but what lay behind it as well.  She found something that defined what she would like to be.  At 69 years of age, this entrepreneurial and determined woman decided to face  the reality of her life.  

The productive activity that she performs is the purchase and sale of cosmetics.  She decided to perform this activity because it is profitable and there are few people who perform this activity in her community.  She has been in this business for ten years and it has given her a good profit for the sustenance of her family.  

The use of this loan is for the purchase of cosmetic products.  For her it is very important to be able to run her business every day as it is the manner in which she can have economic income for the benefit of her family.  One of her goals is to save for a better future.  She is an example to follow, given that despite her age, she never lets obstacles in life impede her.  She also dreams of bettering her home in order to have adequate living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetic products.

loans.name: Yulduz

texts.ru: Юлдуз молодая девушка 19 лет. Она замужем, но пока что не имеет детей.  Она учится в ТГУПБП  на заочном отделение.Она зарабатывает  на жизнь швеёй. Её муж мастер. Они молодожены. Она  обратилась в МДО Арванд  за кредитом для оплаты договора обучения. Она заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Yulduz is a 19-year-old young woman. She is married, but does not yet have children. She attends the Tajikistan State Law, Business and Politics University part-time. She earns a living as a seamstress. Her husband is a contractor. They are newlyweds. She requested a loan from MDO Arvand to pay her university tuition. She is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: Julian vive en casa de sus padres en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz. El oficio que desempeña es de chofer, y es dueno de su propio carro. No obstante, el carro esta danado y Julian necesita el crédito para hacer reparaciones de emergencia en el vehiculo. Aunque Julian es un conductor experto nadie esta libre de problemas en el camino Afortunadamente Julian esta con buena salud y espera que puedan ayudarle
texts.en: Julian lives at home with his parents in a brick home with a cement floor in the Pasankeri zone in the city of La Paz. The job which he undertakes is as a taxi driver and he is the owner of his own car.  Unfortunately the car is currently damaged and Julian needs the loan to make emergency repairs to his vehicule. Although Julian is a skilled driver no one is free from problems on the road. Fortunately, he has his health and he hopes that you all can help him.

loans.use: to make emergency repairs on his taxi

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es soltera y no tiene hijos, ella esta viviendo con sus hermanas en la comunidad de Pallina Chico en una casa de ladrillo y cemento, la familia no tiene lujos pero al menos se las arregla para vivir decentemente Julia continua dedicandose a la cría de ganado y producción de leche, Julia trabaja desde muy temprano y realiza mucho esfuerzo físico, Julia recibe el apoyo de una de sus hermanas pero eso no es suficiente, Julia quiere un credito para compra de más ganado Julia goza de buena salud y espera poder recibir su ayuda
texts.en: Julia is single and has no children. She is living with her sisters in the Pallina Chico community in a brick and cement home. This family has no luxuries but at least manages to live decently. Julia continues earning a living from raising cattle and producing milk. Julia works from very early on and physically strains herself a lot. Julia receives support from one of her sisters but it is not enough. Julia wants a loan to buy more cattle. Julia is in good health and hopes to receive your help.

loans.use: to buy more cattle.

loans.name: Fortin Toledo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Fortin Toledo esta en su Quinto  ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza donde 5 de las 17 señoras  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, lo que quiere decir que deben esforzarse un poco mas para poder ir creciendo.
Una de ellas es la señora Lorenza, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno. Para poder crecer la señora está recibiendo capacitación de plan de negocios y pasos para presentar la venta. Lorenza se dedica a las confecciones varias, y pide este préstamo para la compra de hilos y telas, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo, luchando por crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The group called Fortin Toledo is in the fifth cycle of its committee of women programme, in which everyone is taking the poverty elimination survey. 5 of the 17 women are below the poverty line, which means that they must try a little harder in order to be able to develop.

One of them is Lorenza, whose poverty survey showed her to have a poverty level within level one. In order to be able to develop she is receiving step-by-step business plan capitation so she can sell her goods. Lorenza makes various items and she is asking for this loan to buy threads and fabrics so she can carry on working as she has been, striving to develop and be successful..

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads for dressmaking

loans.name: Ulkhonoy

texts.ru:
Улхоной 29-летняя жительница района А.Джоми. Она замужем за дехканина и у них есть 6-летняя дочь и 4-летний сын. Улхоной счастлива в браке, ведь у нее заботливый муж и замечательные дети. 
Уже год как Улхоной вместе с мужем являются членами дехканского хозяйства. Они на своей участке земли занимаются посевом овощей. Доход с урожая является единственным источником дохода семьи. Целью запрашиваемого кредита является закуп качественных семян овощей, минеральных удобрений и топлива. За счет кредита Улхоной и ее муж собираются провести очередной посев и они очень надеются на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Ulkhonoy is a 29-year-old resident of the A. Jomi. She is married to a dekhan farmer and they have a 6-year-old daughter and a 4-year-old son. Ulkhonoy has a happy marriage since she has a supportive husband and wonderful children. Ulkhonoy and her husband have been members of a dekhan farm for one year. They grow vegetables on their plot of land. Sales from the harvest is their family's only income source. The goal of the requested loan is a purchase of quality vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel. Ulkhonoy and her husband are planning to use the loan to plant their next crop and really hope for Your support.

loans.use: to purchase quality vegetable seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Filwende Group

texts.fr:
Mme BINTOU représente le groupe FILWENDE.  Elle se porte bien ainsi que les autres membres. Mariée, elle est mère de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 28ans et le moins âgé a 12ans. 02 vont à l’école. Elle a 06personnes en charge.
Mme vend des ignames  depuis 15ans. Elle a ajouté la vente du charbon de bois. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter 03sacs d’ignames et 10sacs de charbon de bois.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne s'acheter une parcelle et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Bintou represents the Filwende group. She is doing well, as are the other members. Married, she is the mother of four children - the eldest is 28 and the youngest is 12 years old. Two of them attend school. She has six dependents in total.
She has sold yams for fifteen years, and has added the sale of charcoal. She buys her goods in her local market. She wants to buy three sacks of yams and ten sacks of charcoal. She wants to put her profits into savings, and her ambition is to buy a plot of land and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of yams and ten sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Long

texts.en:
Long, age 52, is a rice farmer from the province of Kampong Cham. He grows and harvests rice to earn a living, selling his crop to local dealers. He has been involved in this type of business since 1999. He is able to earn an average income of USD 2.50 per day. 
 
Long has come up with a new business idea to supplement his income. He wants to offer different types of vegetables for sale around his community, transporting them in a cart. However, he currently has insufficient capital to allow him to start up his new enterprise. Therefore, he is applying for a Kiva loan in order to buy a cart to allow him to begin his new business. 

He hopes that this new trade will help to improve his standard of living. 

He is thankful to all his lenders for their kindness and their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a cart in order to sell vegetables in his community

loans.name: Thejesha

texts.en:
Thejesha is a 32-year-old man who lives in Bangalore with his parents. He completed his education till 12th grade. Thejesha is a volunteer with Sahaja Samrudha NGO, he is engaged full-time in promotion and marketing of traditional organically-grown farm produces. He sources from network farmers under the aegis of Sahaja Samrudha Organic Producer Co Ltd, Bangalore. 

Direct sourcing of staples (rice, wheat, pulses) and vegetable seeds from farmers allows him to sell organic farm products at reasonable price to the consumer and give a better price to the farmer. Seeing his commitment in the team, he was offered a small space in Wipro campus in Bangalore in 2012, to set-up an organic food stall. 

For three years, it has been a hardship job, but now employees are interested and are turning up regularly to buy organic products from him. Now he has requested a loan to setup an organic kiosk to sell organic products. This will help him to have more buyers and to improve his income. 

Help him to have better life.

loans.use: to set up an organic kiosk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in:  galvanized  sheet, cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to construct a wall of his home.

loans.name: Edison Paul

texts.es:
Edison es un joven de 18 años, soltero, gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres y de él pudo terminar sus estudios secundarios, vive en casa de sus padres, a pesar de su corta edad es un hombre muy trabajador, emprendedor con ganas de salir adelante y lograr tener éxitos en su vida. 
Vive en el barrio “El Calvario” un lugar reconocido por la fabricación de bloques es ésta la manera como la mayoría de familias se sustentan, la gente es muy trabajadora y le gusta progresar, Edison se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de 8 semanas, es un hombre con experiencia a pesar de su corta edad y requiere el crédito para comprar alimento, bebederos y pollos y así aumentar sus ganancias.
Edison  agradece a Fundación Alternativa de Ecuador y a KIVA por permitirle cumplir sus sueños y crecer como persona.
texts.en:
Edison is a young man of 18 years of age, he is single and thanks to the efforts of himself and his parents he has finished his secondary level studies. He lives in his parents' house. Despite his young age he is a very hard working and entrepreneurial man with a desire to get ahead and achieve successes in life. He lives in the "El Calvario" district, an area known for the production of blocks and this is how the majority of families support themselves. The people are very hardworking and keen to progress.  

Edison raises and sells chickens of 8 weeks, he has experience in this despite his young age and needs the loan to buy food, water feeders and chickens in order to increase his earnings. Edison is grateful to the Fundación Alternativa de Ecuador and to Kiva to enable him to achieve his dreams and grow as a person.

loans.use: To buy food, water feeders and more chicks in order to increase his earnings and be able to repay his parents.

loans.name: Luis

texts.en:
Luis is 47 years old and newly wed. He has owned a multi-service agency for many years. 

Recently, he moved to a bigger location and needs a loan of $2,150 to purchase new computers and office supplies. He is located in the downtown of Paterson where he has access to the vast Latino community.

loans.use: to purchase new computers and office supplies.

loans.name: Sandro

texts.en:
The client immigrated to the United States from Ecuador a couple of years ago. He has been working as a computer repair technician from his home. 

Due to his outstanding job and high demand from his clients he wants to open a storefront and also needs the $2,350 loan to buy more computer parts to perform his work.

loans.use: to purchase computer parts to fix computers.

loans.name: Zaynura

texts.ru: Зайнура женщина 58 лет. Она  вдова  и  мать двоих  детей.  Зайнура зарабатывает розничной торговлей на местном рынке. На работе её все уважают   и покупатели и конкуренты. Она   обратилась   в МДО Арванд  узнав о  новом продукте «Тахсил». Она решила для  лучшего развития  своего внука   воспользоваться этим и приобрести  компьютер. Она  хочет получить кредит и надеется на положительный результат. Она заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Zaynura is a 58-year-old woman. She is a widow and mother of two children. Zaynura earns a living through retail sales at a local market. Everyone, customers and competitors alike, respect her at work. She came to MDO Arvand after learning about a new product, called "Tahsil". She decided to use this product for her grandson's growth and development and purchase a computer. She wants to obtain this loan and hopes for a positive result. She is grateful in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her grandson

loans.name: Phon

texts.en:
Phon is a 26-year-old married homemaker with two children in her care. She lives in Siem Reap province in Cambodia. Her husband is a 28-year-old construction worker earning $7 a day. 

Her husband always goes to work in different places and spends a lots on traveling expenses so she decided to apply for a loan for her husband to buy a motorbike to commute to work. 

This loan will help her husband to reduce his traveling expenses and save more for the family. For her plans, she is going run a grocery store, renovate her house and help her children to finish high school.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to commute to work.

loans.name: Karen

texts.es:
Karen es una persona responsable, estudiosa y trabajadora con metas a cumplir, sus aspiraciones son terminar su carrera y trabajar para lograr tener así una familia formada.
Ella esta estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas, y por medio de su carrera quiere abrirse camino y convertirse en una excelente profesional.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera para poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Karen is a responsible, studious, hard working person with goals to achieve, her wishes are to finish her degree and to work so that she can form her own family. 

She is studying for a degree in business administration, and through her degree she wants to create opportunities for herself to become an excellent working professional. 

She is asking for this loan in order to pay her university fees, so that she can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ada Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Ada Mercedes de 30 años de edad, vive con su hijo en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5 años al negocio de venta de rosquillas y también vende plásticos, vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Pespire al sur de Honduras,  es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Ada Mercedes está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como maíz, cuajada, soda, leche y leña, también piensa comprar plásticos,  con el apoyo de este préstamo  pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su hijo. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Noviembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Ada Mercedes is 30 years old, lives with her son at home, and has sold donuts and plastic goods for five years. She lives in a building in the Perspire municipality in southern Honduras. She is an enterprising woman with a desire to improve her quality of life, fighting day by day in order to do so. 

Ada Mercedes is asking for this loan to buy products like corn, curds, soda, milk, and wood. She is also thinking of purchasing plastic goods. With the support of this loan, she will try to improve both her income and her quality of life. Her dream is to have a successful business and increase her customer base. At the same time, she hope to improve her's and her son's future.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2014

loans.use: to buy corn, curds, soda, milk, wood, and plastics for her business.

loans.name: Sokcheat

texts.en:
Sokcheat, 38, lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she is working very hard on her own rice farmland by growing and selling the crop to the local dealers and customers in market. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 5.00 a day. 

She is a lovely mother of five single children. One of her total children is going to marry soon. However, she doesn't have enough money to prepare a proper wedding party for her child. Thus, she is applying for a Kiva loan to pay for her child’s wedding party. Through this loan, she hopes that it can bring a real happiness to this new couple. She would like to thank to all the lenders for their financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her child’s wedding party.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La señora Josefina de 49 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus hijas  en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5 años al negocio de venta de rosquillas, y tamales, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Doña Josefina es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como maíz, cuajada, manteca, leña y papas, pollo, etc. Para elaborar tamales y sus rosquillas para tener producto para la temporada navideña.
Doña Josefina con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre del  2014.
texts.en:
Josefina is 49 years old and lives with her husband and their daughters in their own home. For the past 5 years, she has had a business where she sells doughnuts and tamales. She lives in San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. 

Josefina is an entrepreneurial woman who wants to move forward and fights every day to improve her quality of life. She is requesting a loan to purchase products like corn, cottage cheese, butter, firewood, chicken, and potatoes, etc. in order to make tamales and doughnuts in order to have enough products for the holiday season.

With the support of this loan, Josefina hopes to increase her income and her quality of life. Her dream is to have a good business and increase her customer base while at the same time improving her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase corn, cottage cheese, butter, firewood, potatoes, chicken, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mahalaxmi B Group

texts.en:
Indumati is aged about 28 and is a married woman from the village of Tukla located in Nuapada district of Odisha India. She is a very confident and hard-working lady who has two daughters of 10 and 8 years old. The lady standing with raised hand in the middle of the photo is Indumati.

Indumati hails from a traditional cloth weaving community. Weaving and selling of saris is the main source of income of her family. Now she has two hand-looms for weaving saris. On one hand-loom her husband does the work and on the hand-loom she has engaged a weaver to weave saris. Her husband brings the yarn/thread from the local market and after weaving sells the products at the weekly markets.  They work for 8-10 hours a day and weave one piece of sari. 

Indumati sells her product to the local traders on weekly basis. She earns a monthly income of INR 6,000 which is not sufficient to maintain her family. Therefore she thought of how to get more income and along with other nine women of her village formed a Self Help Group (SHG) named Mahalaxmi to take a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. 

From the present loan, she wants to buy thread/yarn in bulk so she can work for a longer period. Purchasing more stock at a time will help her to reduce the purchasing and transportation cost of raw material. Indumati wish to grow her business and save enough to complete her half constructed house and give a better education to her children. 

Out of the other nine member’s eight members have similar business as Indumati and two have cloth business.

loans.use: To purchase thread and yarn in bulk so as to work for a longer period.

loans.name: Jardín De Vida Group

texts.es: Jardín de vida está integrado por cuatro microempresarias emprendedoras, coordinado por Yaris una mujer de 24 años, soltera que se dedica a la comercialización de fundas, almohadas y gaseosas, en las calles de su comunidad, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de almohadas pequeñas, grandes, cortinas y gaseosas, con el crédito anterior logró aumentar los productos ofrecidos mejorando así sus ingresos. El resto de las integrantes del grupo son Geysel de 24 años de edad propietaria de una mini pulpería en su domicilio desde hace tres años, Flor de María de 34 años de edad dedicada a la comercialización de pescado en su comarca desde hace dieciséis años, y María Teodora de 58 años de edad quien comercializa leche y leña en su domicilio desde hace veinte años.
texts.en:
Jardín de vida is made up of four microentrepreneurs, coordinated by a Yaris, 24 year old woman who is single and dedicates herself to the marketing of blankets, pillows and sodas in the streets of her community.  The loan is to purchase large and small pillows, curtains and sodas.  With the previous loan they were able to increase the products offered, in that way bettering their income.  

There are three other members of the group. Geysel is 24 years old, and owner of a mini grocery store in her home for the last three years. Flor de Maria, 34 years old, has been dedicated to the marketing of fish in her region for sixteen years. Finally, Maria Teodora who is 58 years old and has sold milk and firewood in her home for the last twenty years.

loans.use: For the purchase of small and large pillows, curtains and sodas.  This will permit them to supply the demand for these products.

loans.name: Jessica Jehovani

texts.es:
Jessica es una mujer emprendedora de 41 años, oriunda del cantón Vinces perteneciente a la provincia de Los Ríos, costa ecuatoriana, está felizmente casada con Jhon el es militar activo del Ejercito Ecuatoriano, tienen un hijo de 16 años de edad.
Para ella y su esposo  no fue nada fácil luchar por  darle un buen estilo de vida a su hijo, gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio pudieron comprar una pequeña casa en la ciudad de Latacunga, Jessica ha sido un gran apoyo para su esposo en la manutención del hogar y es por eso que Jessica se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos por catálogo, además brinda el servicio de alimentación para el sector donde viven, por lo que ella se acercó a solicitar un crédito el mismo que será invertido en la compra de mercadería nueva por temporada, de  esta manera obtendrá más rentabilidad con la venta de esta mercadería y esto ayudará a mejorar sus estilo de vida y el de su familia.
Jessica agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida laboral y personal.
texts.en:
Jessica is an entrepreneurial woman of 41 years of age. She is native to the Vinces canton which belongs to the Los Rios province on the Ecuadorian coast. She is happily married to Jhon who is an active soldier in the Ecuadorian Army, and they have a 16 year old son.

For her and he husband it has not been at all easy to strive to give their son a good standard of life. Thanks to their efforts and sacrifice they were able to buy a small house in the city of Latacunga. Jessica has been a great support to her husband in providing for their home, and so she sells clothes and shoes by catalogue. She also offers a food service to the local area where they live. She is therefore asking for a loan which will be invested in the purchase of new season's merchandise. In this way she will have greater profitability from the sale of these goods and this will help her to improve her standard of living and that of her family.

Jessica is grateful to the Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and to Kiva for making possible growth in her working and personal life.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and supply her business, and with these profits drive forward her food business for her local area.

loans.name: Tangem

texts.en:
Tangem, age 53, is a rice farmer living in a community in the province of Kampong Cham. She is the mother of six children, six of whom have married and left the home. The youngest is still living with her and under her support. To support her family, Tangem works very hard on her own farmland, growing and harvesting rice and then selling the crop to local dealers and to customers at the market. The net profit that she can generate on average from her farming is USD 5.00 per day. 

Tangem has come up with a new business idea to supplement her income. She wants to raise pigs to offer for sale. However, she has insufficient capital to allow her to start up her new business. Therefore, she is applying for a Kiva loan so that she can buy pigs with which to start her new enterprise. She hopes that this new trade will help to improve her standard of living. 

She would like to thank all her lenders for their financial support and kindness.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fishing gear like nets, hooks, lead weights, and a boat propeller.

loans.name: Bregilda

texts.en:
Bregilda is a married woman with ten dependents. She earns a living by producing and selling tuba (coconut) wine. She is 57 years old and a resident of Dulag, Leyte.  Out of the ten children only one is still attending school. Her husband earns a living by farming. He grows and sells rice.

Bregilda  is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP buy supplies like tungog (it gives a maroon color that helps fermentation of coconut wine) and fertilizers for the farm.   

These materials  will help Bregilda produce and sell more coconut wine. This will also improve the yield of her husband's farm. 

In the future, Bregilda hopes that she could handle her business so it will be successful in order to continue to finance the education of her youngest child.

loans.use: to buy supplies like tungog (it gives a maroon color that helps fermentation of coconut wine) and fertilizers for the  farm.

loans.name: Buenaventurada

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of four children, Buenaventurada works hard to support her family.

She has a abaca weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Buenaventurada is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy abaca fiber, etc. for her abaca weaving business.

Buenaventurada has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy abaca fiber.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 58 years old and married with four children. Carmelita works very hard to provide for them.

Carmelita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages, etc..

Carmelita has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, Carmelita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, beverages.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 49 years old and married with six children. With one child in school, Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a business buying and selling beverages in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of beverages to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of beverages to sell.

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad is 58 years old and married with 10 children. Felicidad works very hard to provide for them.

Felicidad runs a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional stock of rice to sell.

Felicidad has been in this business for 10 years now. 

In the future, Felicidad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beef.

loans.name: Rosa Lilian

texts.es: Rosa es una mujer de 39 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia al lado de su compañero de vida y su hijo de 9 años de edad el cual es la razón de su esfuerzo. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida vendiendo diversidad de productos como: verduras, chicharras, tostadas y frutas, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 30 años, por lo que gracias a su experiencia cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos. Rosa ha observado desde hace algún tiempo que el techo de su vivienda se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que ella desea cambiarlo pero no cuenta con la liquidez económica necesaria para ello, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible y así evitar que sus pocas pertenencias se deterioren.
texts.en:
Rosa is 39 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and 9 year-old son, who is the reason for her efforts. She is a hardworking woman who earns a living selling a variety of products, including vegetables, crickets, tostadas, and fruit. She has been involved with this work for 30 years. Thanks to this experience, she can count on a large number of customers who seek her products. 

Rosa has noticed that the roof of her house has been deteriorating for some time, which is why she wishes to repair it; however, she cannot count on financial liquidity to take care of this problem. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI: to invest in steel sheets, wood, and keys to repair the roof of her house as soon as possible, in order to prevent the deterioration of their few possessions.

loans.use: o invest in steel sheets, wood, and keys to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Lesbia

texts.es:
La señora Lesbia Isela  de 24  años de edad, vive con su mama en su  casa propia,  se dedica desde hace 3 años al negocio de venta de ropa  usada, vende pantalones, camisas, chores, bóxer, licras, camisetas, vestidos, faldas, braseares, biquinis, etc. También venden productos como, juego de sala, cómodas de madera, gaveteros, etc.
Doña Lesbia vive en San Lorenzo, Valle, al sur de Honduras, es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Lesbia esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de blusas, vestidos, camisas, pantalones para tener producto para vender en la temporada navideña y también piensa comprar materiales para construir un baño nuevo en su casa, con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre 2014.
texts.en:
Lesbia Isela is 24 years old and lives with her mother in their own home. For the past 3 years she's been working selling used clothing like pants, shirts, shorts, skirts, dresses, leggings, boxer shorts, bras and swimsuits. She also sells furniture like living room sets, dressers and chests.

Lesbia lives in San Lorenzo, in the Valle district of southern Honduras, and is an enterprising woman with a great desire to get ahead in life, who fights every day to improve her quality of life. She is asking for a loan to buy blouses, dresses, shirts and pants to have plenty of products to sell at Christmas. She also plans to build a new bathroom in her house. With the help of this loan she hopes to improve her income and quality of life.

Lesbia's dream is to have a thriving business and increase her clientele, and at the same time work towards a better future with her family.

loans.use: buy blouses, dresses, shirts and pants to have plenty of products to sell at Christmas.

loans.name: Dima 27023 Group

texts.en:
Joumana is the featured borrower for Dima 27023 Group. She got along with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and living at the same time.

Joumana is a 36-year-old widowed mother of three children. She is a sacrificing mother who is trying desperately to provide her family with better living conditions. Thus, today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay her children's school tuition fees.

Joumana is the lady on the right in the photo. With respect to the other group members, Lina is the lady sitting in the middle, and Mona is the lady on the left.

loans.use: to pay her children's school tuition fees.

loans.name: Catteren

texts.en:
Catteren runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She is selling basic household merchandise like eggs, candles, cooking oil, toothpaste, sugar, canned goods, biscuits and toiletries. She is 33-year-old married woman with three kids ages 7,5 and 8 months old respectively. Together with her family, she lives in Dulag, Leyte.

Catteren has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy additional stock for the store and additional capital for her food vending business start-up. With this stock, her store will be filled with variety of stock and this will result in more buyers coming to the shop. She could now also start to go into a food vending business to augment her daily income.

Catteren is hoping that someday, she could manage her both sources of income successfully for the welfare of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for the store and additional capital for her food vending business start-up.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 34 years old and married with three children. With two children in school, Mary Ann works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like beverages, bread, rice, and canned goods.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like beverages, bread, rice, and canned goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: sheet metal, wood and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.ru: Ханифе 43 года. Она замужняя женщина, но ее муж находиться за приделами страны на заработках. Ханифа мать четверых детей. Воспитанием детей она занимается сама. Ханифа занимается животноводством, за счет данной деятельности она приносит в дом доход. Она покупает молодых бычков и телят, после откорма Ханифа продает их с наценкой на скотном дворе. Ханифа решила купить еще несколько телят, чтобы расширить деятельность и увеличит доход, тогда у нее будет больше экономических возможностей.
texts.en: Hanife is 43 and married, but her husband is currently abroad as a migrant worker.  She has four children, and is raising all of them herself.  She's a livestock farmer by trade, typically buying young calves and fattening them for resale at a cattle yard for a profit.  Hanife has decided to buy a few more calves for her farm so she'll be able to expand her business, increase her income and have more financial freedom.

loans.use: To purchase calves to expand his business

loans.name: Zuma Group

texts.en:
Rashidi, who is in his early 40s, is married with four children who are still going to school. He has been running several projects, selling water, selling wood and has a motorcycle, for five years now. He works from 06am to 09pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Rashidi's 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to start selling wood, increased his water stock and serviced his motorcycle. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He used the profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses. He will use this loan to buy more wood to resell, to increase his water stock and to service his motorcycle. He dreams of owning a daladala (minibus for passenger transportation).

Rashidi will share this loan with his loan group "Zuma" which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more wood to resell, to increase on water stock and to service his motorcycle

loans.name: Maria Jacinta

texts.es:
La señora María de 66 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hija en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 12 años al negocio de venta de rosquillas y pan, vive en una aldea de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras.
Doña María es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida, está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como maíz, cuajada y leña que son la materia prima para elaborar sus rosquillas con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida.
Doña María su sueño es tener un buen negocio y aumentar su clientela  y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre de 2014
texts.en:
Maria is 66 years old and lives with her husband and her daughter in their home, which is in a building in San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has sold bread and doughnuts for 12 years. 

Maria is a hardworking woman with the desire to get ahead in life, fighting day by day to improve her quality of live. She is requesting this loan to buy products like corn, curds, and wood, which are the primary materials for the production of her donuts. With the support of this loan, she will try to improve both her income and her quality of life. 

Maria's dream is to have a thriving business and increase her client base. At the same time, she wishes to improve her future alongside her family. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2014

loans.use: to buy corn, curds, and wood for her business.

loans.name: Seda

texts.en:
Seda is 52 years old and she lives with her family in Vanadzor city of Lori region. Seda is married and she has two daughters. Her elder daughter is just 28 years old, but unfortunately she is already a widow (her husband died when his was performing his military duty) and with her child she lives now with her parents. Seda’s younger daughter is 27 and she is a salesgirl at the food market. Seda’s husband works as a driver. For over 15 years Seda has run her own business; in her small market she sells household goods such as washing powders, detergent and different chemicals for bathroom cleaning, soups, also air fresheners, etc. She says that her business is the only constant source of income for her family. Her husband with his car helps her to bring merchandise once in a month from Yerevan.

Seda requested a loan in an amount of 400.000 Armenian drams since she wants to refresh the assortment of her market; and with coming of New Year holidays she also wants to buy thematic souvenirs for this period’s sale, since it makes a nice present for the New Year.

loans.use: to refresh the assortment of her market and she also wants to buy thematic souvenirs for the New Year holidays sale

loans.name: Leora

texts.en:
Leora is a 35-year-old married woman from Iloilo, Philippines. Leora has been engaged in the fishing business with her husband for more than 8 years now. This is the source of their income.

Leora is asking for a loan to buy crude oil for the boat engine, new fishing nets and lead weights. This loan will help Leora and her husband improve their catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

In the future, Leora hopes to make their fishing business a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for reinvestment in the business and for the future schooling of her child.

loans.use: to buy crude oil for the boat engine, new fishing nets and lead weights.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, clasps, and elastic.

loans.name: Omar Orlando

texts.es:
Omar tiene 24 años, nació en la comunidad de Pozuelos de la provincia Monteagudo del departamento de Chuquisaca, hace unos años atrás Omar decidió mudarse a la ciudad de Santa Cruz, a la casa de sus tíos para poder estudiar la carrera de Contaduría Pública, su familia se quedó a vivir en su comunidad; su mayor motivación es poder apoyar económicamente a su familia, y ser un profesional exitoso; pues él es de escasos recursos, motivo por el cual solicita un crédito educativo. 

Actualmente Omar trabaja como auxiliar contable en una empresa de instalaciones eléctricas y comenta que a pesar de la distancia, tiene el apoyo incondicional de su familia, que lo impulsa a seguir adelante hasta alcanzar sus sueños, además se considera un estudiante dedicado puesto que continúa estudiando en sus horas de descanso aprovechando de esta manera cada minuto libre que tiene. 

Omar se siente emocionado y agradecido con aquellas personas que a través de sus recursos económicos ayudan a los jóvenes, dándoles una oportunidad de cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Omar is 24 years old. He was born in the community of Pozuelos, in the province of Monteagudo and the department of Chuquisaca. Some years ago Omar decided to move to the city of Santa Cruz, to the house of his aunt and uncle, so that he could study in the program in Public Accounting. His family still lives in their community. His great motivation is to be able to support his family economically and be a successful professional. Since he has scarce resources, this is the reason why he is applying for an educational loan.

Omar now works as a bookkeeper in an electrical installation business, and he comments to us that in spite of the distance, he has the unconditional support of his family, which drives him to continue forward to reach his dreams. In addition, he considers himself a dedicated student, since he continues studying during his hours of rest, in this way taking advantage of every free minute that he has.

Omar is touched and grateful to those people who help young people through their economic resources, giving them an opportunity to accomplish their dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his program in public accounting

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
Construyendo el país de la eterna primavera y del desarrollo, Freddy de 39 años de edad soltero con 4 hijos, el primer hijo ya tiene familia independiente y los 3 últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad donde ellos viven el es un hombre emprendedor y con grandes aspiraciones hacia el futuro y en superar en la vida.

La actividad principal de el es la albañilería en la comunidad donde el vive, desde niño el tomo la decisión de aprender a construir casas de su comunidad dicha profesión a la venido trabajando desde hace 5 largos años de sacrificio pero que lo ha hecho con mucho orgullo parque lo hace por su familia porque necesitan de un ingreso económico para la satisfacción de las necesidades de su familia y para el desarrollo de su comunidad donde vive.

El propósito del crédito que el desea realizar es para la compra de herramientas de construcción en la albañilería ya que es de importancia para el y sin esas herramientas el no podrá trabajar para seguir construyendo en su comunidad.

Uno de los más grandes sueños de Freddy es ver crecer a sus hijos y darle educación para que lleguen a ser profesionales y poner una constructora para el servicio de su comunidad y el desarrollo en un futuro.
texts.en:
Building the country of eternal spring and development, Freddy is a 39 year old single dad of 4 kids. His oldest son already has his own family and his 3 other children are excellent students of the local school in the community where they live.  He is an entrepreneur with big aspirations for the future and to overcome difficulties in life.  

The main activity he undertakes is masonry which he does in the community where he lives.  Since he was a child he took the decision to learn how to build houses.  He has sacrificed 5 long years to doing this profession. He has done so with great pride as he does it for his family as they require the financial income it provides in order to satisfy the needs of the family and for the development of the community where he lives. 

The purpose of the loan he wants is to buy masonry tools which are important for him as without these tools he won't be able to work to keep building in his community.  One of Freddy's biggest dreams is to see his children grow up and provide them with the necessary education to become professionals. Also, he wishes to provide a construction person for helping in his community and also to develop in the future.

loans.use: to buy construction tools

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, desde muy joven aprendió a cocinar y su buena sazón le ha permitido, desde el año 1994 mantenerse en el negocio de restaurante. En sus inicios ella vendía solo sopas,(comida colombiana a que cosiste en un caldo, al que se le agregan vegetales y productos cárnicos, y se sirve con arroz, a la hora del almuerzo principalmente);  hoy día ofrece desayunos, almuerzos, licores y cervezas. Sus principales clientes son las personas que habitan en el sector y desean acceder a sus deliciosos platillos o a un rato de esparcimiento y diversión.  Sus ventas se generan de contado por ello tiene un excelente flujo de caja.  Sus compras las realiza en un sector del centro de la ciudad de contado. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará canastas de cervezas; esta inversión favorecerá sus ventas, en las que mantiene un promedio  semanal de hasta 45 canastas, y su recuperación, con esta inversión, será rápida con ello podrá reinvertir y obtener ganancias satisfactorias. Ana tiene 46 años y es madre de un hijo de 23 años y 3 hijas de 22, 20 y 18 años, su meta familiar a largo plazo es viajar con su familia y su meta en el negocio es ampliarlo y mejorar el surtido.
texts.en:
From a young age, Ana learned how to cook and her good seasoning has allowed her to maintain a restaurant business since 1994, which was opened on this day. When she started, she only sold soup (in Colombia, food with a broth base with added vegetables and meat, served with rice primarily at lunchtime).

Now, she offers breakfast, lunch, liquor, and beer. Her main customers are people who live in the area and want to have her delicious meals once in awhile for fun and relaxation. She makes her sales in cash so she has a good cash flow. She makes her purchases in the central part of the city using cash.

Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, which is her first with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With the loan, she will buy cases of beer. This loan will help her sales. She averages around 45 cases weekly. Her return on this investment will be quick and she will reinvest it to make better profits.

Ana, 46, is a mother of a 23-year-old son and three daughters, aged 22, 20, and 18. Her long-term goal is to travel with her family and her business goal is to grow it and improve her stock.

loans.use: to buy cases of beer.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria es viuda pero ha conseguido una pareja recientemente, Maria tiene dos hijos y vive en la comunidad de Avichaca en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad y tiene solamente luz y agua Maria se dedica a la produccion de leche y a la agricultura y quiere un credito para la compra de forraje para su ganado Maria goza de buena salud y es la unica fuente de ingreso para sus hijos, por lo que espera recibir su ayuda
texts.en:
Maria is a widow, but has recently began a relationship with a new partner. Maria has two children and lives in the Avichaca community in an adobe house that she owns, and that has only water and electricity. 
 
Maria’s business is milk production and agriculture, and she would like to take out a loan to buy fodder for her cattle. 

Maria is in good health, and is the only breadwinner for her children. For this reason she is requesting your help.

loans.use: to buy fodder for her cattle.

loans.name: Milly

texts.en:
Milly lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children and all her children go to school. She takes care of two additional family members. She makes school uniforms and sweaters. She operates her business on retail basis from home. She has been in this business for the last 11 years. She works seven days a week.

She has requested a loan of 2,600,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy material for making uniforms and sweaters. She gets additional income from rental houses. Her major business challenge includes seasonality and electricity. Her goal and aspiration is to buy a better sewing machine for making sweaters.

She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy materials for making sweaters and uniforms

loans.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel tiene 54 años de vida y vive solo pero tiene una hija que es la razón de su esfuerzo a la que apoya económicamente a pesar de no vivir con ella. Él se gana la vida prestando sus servicios de seguridad y cuidando de los jardines de una hacienda cercana. Israel desea a cambiar el techo de la vivienda en la que habita ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que espera poder cambiarlo lo antes posible con el apoyo de un crédito que solicita a FUSAI y el cual invertirá en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Israel is 54 years old and lives alone, but he has a daughter who is the reason for his efforts. Israel provides her with economic aid, despite the fact that he does not live with her. He earns his living as a security guard and, also, cares for gardens in a nearby hacienda. 

Israel wishes to change the roof on the residence where he lives, since the present roof is much deteriorated. And he hopes to change it as soon as possible, with the help of a loan he is requesting through FUSAI. 

He will invest his loan in purchasing laminated galvanized roofing sheets, wood, and nails in order to install the new roof.

loans.use: invest in galvanized laminate roofing sheets, wood and nails to install a new roof on his residence.

loans.name: Jackeline Vanessa

texts.es:
Jackeline, es una joven estudiante natural de Lima. Ella vive en el Distrito de Villa El Salvador junto a sus 2 hermanos menores y sus padres.  Su madre es empleada del hogar y su padre realiza trabajos muy eventuales de manera informal como obrero de construcción. 
Ella empezó a trabajar a los 17 años de edad,  en una tienda, vendiendo DVD durante 6 meses, solo le pagaban propinas, luego se fue a laborar a un colegio como auxiliar percibiendo S/. 80.00 nuevos soles semanales, actualmente está trabajando en una tienda de jugos en el área de atención al cliente.
A pesar de estar trabajando y estudiando, Jackeline actualmente está cursando el 2do. Ciclo de la Carrera de Administración Industrial, e  indica que de no haber tenido acceso a este crédito, la hubiera afectado mucho, ya que por no tener el dinero suficiente para solventar sus pagos, tendría que haber dejado de estudiar y solo trabajaría para poder reunir el dinero que le falta para culminar sus estudios.
A ella le interesa mucho su carrera porque quiere tener su propio negocio, que sea grande y espera ser muy reconocida, ella sabe que con mucho esfuerzo sentirá la satisfacción de ser alguien en la vida y haber logrado todos sus objetivos, para así de una u otra manera ayudar a su familia. 
Para ella, KIVA es una institución que da la mano a los jóvenes y personas que necesitan ayuda económicamente para poder acabar sus estudios, ser excelentes profesionales y así de una manera u otra ayudar a que el país crezca con los nuevos profesionales bien capacitados, por eso desde ya agradece mucho a KIVA por la ayuda que le están brindando.
texts.en:
Jackeline is a young student and a native of Lima. She lives in the Villa El Salvador district alongside her two younger siblings and her parents. Her mother is a domestic employee and her father does odd jobs on an informal basis, like construction work.

She began working at 17 years old in a shop, selling DVDs for six months; they only paid her in tips. Later, she went to work in a school as an aide, receiving 80 nuevos soles [PEN] per week. Currently, she is working in a juice shop, serving customers. Despite working and studying, Jackeline is currently in the second year of the Industrial Administration degree program. She says that if she had not had access to this loan, she would have been greatly affected; she would have had to leave school for lack of sufficient money to make her payments, and she would have just worked in order to save up the money she needed to complete her studies.

Her degree program really interests her because she wants to have her own business; she wants it to be big and well-known. She knows that with great effort, she will feel the satisfaction of being someone in life, and she will have achieved all her goals in order to—one way or another—help her family. 

To Jackeline, Kiva is an institution that lends a hand to young adults and people who need financial help in order to finish their studies and be excellent professionals; in one way or another, these new, well-trained professionals will help the country grow. That's why she now thanks Kiva very much for the help that they are providing her.

loans.use: to pay an outstanding debt and to be able to continue studying Industrial Administration in order to become a great professional

loans.name: Rosa Mercy

texts.es: Rosa vive en Ventanas provincia de los Rios, tiene 34 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos y se dedica  a la venta de calzado, solicita el crédito para la compra de mercaderia de zapatos para aumentar el  negocio y obtener mas ganancia para solventar los gastos de su familia . Realiza las compras en Ventanas. Su sueño es comprarse un terreno para construir una casa. En su tiempo libre le gusta realizar las tareas de la escuela con sus hijos.
texts.en: Rosa lives in Ventanas, a province of Los Rios.  She is 34 years old, lives with her two children and earns a living selling shoes. She is asking for a loan for the purchase of shoes as merchandise to sell to improve her business and have more earnings to cover the costs of her family.   She makes her sales in Ventanas.  Her dream is to buy a piece of land in order to build a house.  In her free time she likes to help her children do their homework.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell

loans.name: Bayan

texts.en: Bayan is a conservative lady. She asked her father to be in the photo instead of herself. Bayan is a 21-year-old, single woman. She lives in Baqaa, which is one of the refugee camps in Jordan. Bayan was not able to enroll in the University for lack of money. Her father has a small pigeon-breeding business that is supporting the family. Bayan wants to help her father improve the business so she decided to apply for a loan to buy food for the birds and warm up the birds cage in the winter by adding cage insulation, boards to build walls.

loans.use: to buy bird feed for a pigeon breeding business and add cage insulation and boards to build walls to warm the birds during the winter.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es: Jose de 67 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años al cultivo de lechugas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, Jose vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi seguir con sus cultivos ya que le ha ido muy bien en estos meses.
texts.en:
Jose is 67 years old and has been growing lettuce for many years. He sells his products at different markets that are located near his house. Jose lives in his own home along with his family.

He is requesting a new loan in order to buy fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, and other supplies so that he can continue growing his crops, which have been doing well in recent months.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Dúo Rositas De San Bartolo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Rositas de San Bartolo
Este dúo está formado por doña Gladis Anabella, ella tiene 36 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de refacciones y desayunos en San Bartolomé Milpas Altas por las mañanas y tardes en su domicilio, ella está solicitando el crédito para la renovación de su licuadora y su estufa que utiliza para hacer las refacciones y también necesita comprar una olla para derretir chocolate ya que su deseo es vender helados y choco frutas, su mayor anhelo es ahora conseguir un local ya en el mercado local.
texts.en:
Gladis Anabella, 36, is a member of Rositas de San Bartolo Duo.  She earns a living selling snacks and breakfast in San Bartolomé Milpas Altas in the morning and at home in the afternoon.

She's requesting the loan to upgrade her blender and her stove, which she uses to make the snacks.  She also needs to buy a pot to melt chocolate because she wants to sell ice cream and chocolate-covered fruit.

Gladis's biggest dream is to get a retail space in the local market.

loans.use: to buy utensils for her business (a blender, pots, a stove)

loans.name: Dúo Maranatha Group

texts.es:
Dúo Maranatha
El cual está conformado por la señora Alejandra y la señora  Romelia Santos quien es propietaria de una venta de ropa americana y una miscelánea y tiene a cargo un hijo la señora Romelia ya lleva 19 años vendiendo en su comunidad y desea invertir un poco más en su negocio ya que por la época navideña que viene quiere invertir en el mismo por lo que solicita de ustedes un nuevo crédito y de antemano agradece que se le tome en cuenta dicha solicitud es su segundo credito que solicita.
texts.en:
The "Maranatha" duo

This duo has Alejandra and Romelia as its members. Romelia owns a business selling American clothes and miscellaneous products. Romelia has a son. She has been selling goods in her community for 19 years and wants to invest a little more in her business as the Christmas season is approaching. Romelia is applying for a loan. She thanks you in advance for considering her application. This is Romelia's second loan.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Jesica Maria

texts.es:
La señora  Jesica  de 33  años de edad,  tiene tres  hijos que dependen de ella, vive con su esposo, en su  casa que alquila, vive en la comunidad  de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras y se dedica desde hace 03 años al negocio de venta de tortillas y también vende ropa usada.
Doña Jesica actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada, sus clientes son los amigos, vecinos y personas que conoce en las diferentes aldeas y caseríos de la zona que visita.
Doña Jesica está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de pantalones, faldas, calzonetas, blusas, vestidos, etc. y espera que para esta época navideña pueda vender lo suficiente para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Su sueño es tener su propia casa algún día.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Jesica, 33, has three dependent children.  She lives with her husband in a rental house in the community of San Lorenzo, Valle, in the south of Honduras.  She has worked for three years in her business selling tortillas.

She also earns a living selling new and used clothing.  Her customers are friends, neighbors, and people she knows in the various towns and hamlets in the areas she visits.

Jesica's requesting the loan to buy pants, skirts, shorts, blouses, dresses, and so on.  She hopes she can sell enough this Christmas season to improve her quality of life and her family's.

Her dream is to have her own home one day.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, November 2014

loans.use: to buy pants, skirts, shorts, blouses, dresses, etc. for her business

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly, who is 63 years old, is living in a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has five children in total; one is single and four are married. To make a living and support the family, she has been involved in a farming business since 1979, growing rice and mangos, and selling her agricultural product to the local dealers and customers in market. 

The net profit that she can generate is USD 5.00 a day, on average.

In this farming season, Ly is lacking money to buy some farm supplies for her mango plantation. To continue her farming, she is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides.  

She is thankful to lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides

loans.name: Dúo Los Encantos Group

texts.es:
DUO LOS ENCANTOS
Doña Catarina, es originaria del municipio de tecpan, ella tiene 55 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones y venta de frutas.
Desde hace años ella empezó su propio negocio y gracias a Dios poco apoco a podido salir adelante con su negocio, gracias al esfuerzo de ella y al apoyo de sus hijos.
El crédito que ella recibió lo utilizo para comprar materia prima para sus refacciones y ampliar un poco mas su venta de frutas.
Ella sueña con  ampliar mas su negocio, ofrecer otra  variedad de productos a sus clientes y asi obtendrá mejores ganancias y poder mejorar su calidad de vida. en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para refacciones y compra de frutas para la venta.
texts.en:
DUO LOS ENCANTOS [Charming Duo].
Catarina, aged 55, is originally from the Tecpan municipality. She works selling spare parts and fruit.
Some years ago she started her own business and has been able to get ahead step by step thanks to God, her efforts and the support of her children.
The loan Catarina received was used towards buying raw materials for the spare parts sale and to expand her fruit sales.
She dreams of expanding her business, offering a greater variety of products to her customers and in this way increase her income and improve her quality of life. This loan will be used to buy material to make repairs and to buy fruit to sell.

loans.use: To buy materials to make repairs and to buy fruit to sell

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is a 45-year-old married woman, and a mother of two children from Iloilo, Philippines. She has a motorcycle, or locally know as habal-habal, which is a one mode of transportation. She is also engaged in hog raising and a fishing business.
 
Rowena is asking for a loan to buy gasoline for the motorcycle and new fishing nets and piglets to raise. A loan will help her improve their business, thus augmenting their income.

In the future, Rowena hopes of expanding their business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to buy gasoline for the motorcycle and new fishing nets and piglets to raise

loans.name: Edgar Enrique

texts.es:
Edgar logro en el año 2008 conformar un negocio único en su barrio, una vidriera con lo que ha logrado suplir las necesidades básicas de su familia conformada por su esposa  y sus dos hijos de 9 y 8 años de edad.
Edgar busca algo más para su negocio poder darle sostenibilidad, aumentar su inventario y portafolio de oferta a los clientes,  lo malo es que el costos de los insumos son muy altos es por ello que quiere solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de diferentes tipos de vidrios buscando suplir cualquier necesidad y cualquier demanda que se presente en su negocio.
Entre sus sueños está, pagar la educación de sus hijos y comprar vivienda.
Edgar espera tu apoyo  ayúdalo a seguir forjando sus sueños.
texts.en: Edgar opened a unique business in his neighborhood in 2008: a glass shop. With this business he has been able to meet his family's basic needs. He is married and has two children ages 9 and year years old. Edgar seeks something more for his business to be able to give it sustainability, increase his inventory and portfolio of products to offer his customers. The bad part is, the costs of the supplies is very high so he wants to seek a loan to buy a stock of all kinds of glass to meet the needs of the customers that come to his business. Among his dreams are to pay for the education of his children and to buy a home. Edgar hopes for your help to help him continue making his dreams come true.

loans.use: to buy a stock of all kinds of glass to meet the needs of the customers that come to his locale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for semester fees.

loans.name: Douglas Alexander

texts.es:
Douglas de 19 años de edad, está acompañado y no tiene hijos, estudió hasta 9° grado de educación básica, su esposa es ama de casa y es la única que vive con él y solo ella depende de él. Douglas, es agricultor  desde muy joven, aprendió el oficio con su padre, pero desde hace 3 años tiene una tienda en su casa en la que se involucra su pareja.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como pan, azúcar, jabón, detergentes, aceite, condimentos granos básicos y demás para abastecer el inventario de su tienda. Su sueño es fortalecer las ventas del negocio para proveer del estudio a sus futuros hijos
texts.en:
Douglas is 19 years old, he is married, has no children, and he has a ninth grade education. His wife is a housewife, she is the only one who lives with him, and his only dependant. Edwin has been a farmer since he was very young, he learned the trade from his father, but for the past three years he has had a store in his home where he involves his wife.

He is requesting the loan to buy products such as bread, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, condiments, staple grains and more to stock the store inventory. His dream is to increase sales at his store to provide an education for his future children.

loans.use: to buy products such as bread, sugar, soap, detergent, oil, condiments, staple grains and more.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Al trabajar la tierra bajo un sol agotador sin embargo dispuesto a sudar todo el tiempo para brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Jorge de 47 años de edad soltero, el motivo por el cual el está impulsado en realizar otro préstamo es para una nueva inversión el cultivo de papas.

Antes los préstamos eran con otras instituciones, pero no contaban con los beneficios que nos da ADICLA como lo es la forma de pago, intereses mensuales y el capital al vencimiento pus son beneficios que nos ayudan a soñar en un futuro mejor para nuestros futuros hijos.
