He wants a loan to purchase supplies such as flour, sugar, salt, yeast, etc. Freddy's problem is that he doesn't have anyone to go to so he needs your help, in addition, he enjoys good health.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as flour, sugar, salt, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es divorciado pero tiene un hijo al que cuida y quiere mucho Juan vive en El Alto y ha regresado con sus padres a la casa de adobe Juan es carpintero y quiere un credito para comprar madera Juan es la clase de carpintero que toma toda clase de pedidos por lo que el credito le ayudara mucho para mantener a su hijo El cliente goza de buena salud y espera recibir su ayuda
texts.en: Juan is divorced but he has a son who he takes cares of and loves very much. Juan lives in El Alto and has returned with his parents to the adobe house. Juan is a carpenter and wants a loan to purchase wood. Juan is the kind of carpenter who takes all sorts of orders, so the loan will help him a lot to take care of his son. He enjoys good health and hopes to get your help.

loans.use: to purchase wood

loans.name: Deice Mireya

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito De Colorado se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la  señora Daice, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, dos de sus hijos aun viven en su casa  y estudian en universidad. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Deice es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos ayudarle  a su marido con los gastos del hogar, se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo,  zapatos por catalogo y bisuterías, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan de alguna prenda. Trabaja todos los días más que todo en las mañanas, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Tiene 15  años que se dedica a esta actividad que empezó con el primer crédito que recibió de la institución por lo cual está muy agradecida por la oportunidad de tener su negocio y lograr algo para el bien de sus hijos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos  y bisuterías. Esta desde el inicio del Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque el primer crédito empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The communal bank of Colorado meets every other week in Colorado (Montecristi Canton), a city known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its artisans, whose work is known at both national and international levels. It is home to famous traditional straw hats.
This is where Deice lives. She is 50 years old and married, and has three adult children, two of whom still live at home while studying at the university. Her husband is a driver.
Deice is a housewife who sells all kinds of clothing, shoes, and jewellery from a catalogue to make her own income and help her husband with household expenses. She sells door-to-door and she also sells from her home, where her clients come when they need garments. She works every day, mostly in the mornings. She gives her products on credit and charges every 15 days. She has been doing this work for 15 years, and it started from her first loan from this institution. She is very grateful for it because it gave her the opportunity to have her own business and do something for her children.
She will use this loan to buy clothes, shoes, and jewellery. She has been a member of her communal bank from the beginning, and she likes it because she started her business with the first loan. Her dream is to give her family the best life she can.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and jewellery to sell.

loans.name: Yinger Marilin

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito De Colorado que se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Yinger, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 17, 15 y 8 años de edad, los mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es mecánico automotriz.
Doña Yinger es una muy buena madre y esposa que para ayudarle a su marido realiza el crédito una parte para ella y otra para que el lo utilice en su trabajo, él tiene un taller de mecánica automotriz en su casa y allí mismo  ella también tiene su negocio, ella vende repuestos de carros,  aceites, líquidos de frenos, llantas entre otras cosas, ella aprovecha para venderles a los clientes que a diario asisten al taller de su esposo el cual es muy concurrido ya que su marido tiene mucha experiencia arreglando automóviles, el lleva más de 17 años dedicado  esta actividad con la cual salen adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar llantas, aceites, repuestos y varias herramientas que el necesita, lleva más de 8 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante. Sus sueños son ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank of Colorado meets every other week in Colorado (Montecristi Canton), a city known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its artisans, whose work is known at both national and international levels. It is home to famous traditional straw hats.
This is where Yinger lives. She is 38 years old and married, and has three children, aged 17, 15, and 8. The first two go to secondary school and the youngest one goes to primary school. Her husband is an automobile repairman.
As a good wife and mother, Yinger is taking out the loan for herself and for her husband to use in his work. He has a car repair workshop at their home where she also sells spare parts, motor oil, brake fluid, tyres, and other items. She sells these on a daily basis to customers who visit her husband's workshop, which is very busy, since he has a lot of experience repairing cars and has had the workshop for more than 17 years. This is how he earns a living and provides for the family.
The loan is to buy tyres, motor oil, spare parts, and various tools, which are vital to his trade. Yinger has been in the communal bank for 8 years and she likes it because the loans help her improve her family's life. Her dream is for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy tyres, motor oil, spare parts, and tools.

loans.name: Luadany

texts.es: Luadany es madres soltera de un hijo y vive con sus padres en El Alto Ella y su familia viven en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a los padres de Luadany, la clienta se dedica al acabado de productos textiles y quiere un prestamo para comprar una maquina Luadany no tiene a nadie que pueda apoyarla con dinero sus padres le dan casa y comida pero ella goza de buena salud y tiene mucha fe en su trabajo
texts.en: Luadany is a single mother with a son and lives with her parents in El Alto. She and her family live in an adobe house that belongs to Luadany's parents. She works finishing textile products and wants a loan to purchase a machine. Luadany doesn't have anyone to help her with money. Her parents provide her with house and food but she enjoys good health and has a lot of faith in her work.

loans.use: to purchase a finishing machine for textile products.

loans.name: Franz

texts.es:
Franz se dedica a la venta de singani artesanal, vive en casa propia en un acabado fino y piso de cemento, su vivienda esta ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz
Franz vende singani artesanal, del cual genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, luz, agua. Ultimamente Franz ha estado ayudando a una empresa de bebidas alcoholicas con sus tramites legales y ha estado envasando  vinos, Franz quiere el crédito para potenciar su actividad de envasado, como se acerca la navidad, hay mucha gente que compra vino y Franz ve una oportunidad de hacer negocios
texts.en:
Franz works selling artisanal singani. He lives in his own house with a fine finish and cement floor. his house is located in the city of La Paz. 

Franz sells artisanal singani. From that he generates his income to cover the costs of food, electricity and water. Lately, Franz has been helping an alcoholic beverages company with its legal paperwork and he has been bottling wines. Franz wants the loan to boost the bottling activity because Christmas is drawing near. There are a lot of people who buy wine and Franz sees the opportunity to do business.

loans.use: to boost his wine bottling business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized metal sheeting, wood and nails to build a home from metal sheeting on his property.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting, sand, cement and bricks.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene tiene 3 hijos y vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es propia Rene es un abogado honesto y dedicado que se encuentra trabajando para una empresa pero Rene quiere apostar por si mismo y por eso ha pedido un credito para poner en funcionamiento su propia oficina de abogado Rene es la unica fuente de ingresos para sus hijos, goza de buena salud y su emprendimiento tiene futuro
texts.en: Rene has three children and lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house which is his own. Rene is an honest and dedicated lawyer who works in a business, but Rene wants to work for himself and for this he has asked for a loan to open his own lawyer's office. Rene is the only source of income for his children, he enjoys good health, and his undertaking has a future.

loans.use: to open his own lawyer's office.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a 21-inch TV.

loans.name: Wendy

texts.es: Wendy es soltera, no tiene hijos, aun así su situacion no es estable, por eso vive con sus padres en La paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es propiedad de sus padres. Wendy es docente universitaria de una materia de la carrera de medicina y quiere un prestamo para compra de material medico para poder atender consultas a domicilio y ganar dinero extra Sus padres la ayudan pero solo con la casa y la comida, asi que Wendy necesita un apoyo extra por parte de Kiva para salir adelante
texts.en: Wendy is single. She doesn't have any children, but even so, her situation is unstable. That is why she lives with her parents in La Paz in a brick and cement house that her parents own. Wendy teaches medicine at a university and she wants a loan to buy medical materials for medical visits in her house so she can earn some extra money. Her parents help her but only with the house and with food, so Wendy needs extra help from Kiva to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy medical materials for medical visits in her home.

loans.name: Yesica Esmeralda

texts.es: Yesica cuenta con 20 años de edad es soltera y habita en vivienda propia junto a su padre, su madre y su grupo familiar. Ella es una joven emprendedora que pone todo su carisma y esfuerzo para realizar la mayor venta de productos de belleza por catálogo posible, ya que sabe que es gracias a ello que ha logrado salir adelante  y apoyar tanto a sus padres como a su grupo familiar. Yesica desea realizar mejoras en su vivienda, ya que su cuarto dormitorio esta hecho de lámina deteriorada, por lo que ella ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para realizar la inversión en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para realizar mejoras en su cuarto dormitorio de lámina.
texts.en: Yesica is 20 years old, single, and lives in her own house with her father, her mother, and her family. She is an enterprising young woman who has put all her charisma and efforts into making the best possible beauty product sales from a catalog, since she knows that it is thanks to that that she has managed to get ahead and support her parents and her family so much. Yesica wants to make some improvements to her house, since her bedroom is made of deteriorating metal sheeting, so she has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in galvanized metal sheeting, wood, and nails to make repairs to her bedroom made of metal sheeting.

loans.use: to invest in galvanized metal sheeting, wood and nails to make repairs on her bedroom made of metal sheeting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corrugated metal, cement, and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in stone, cement, sand and labor costs to build a retention wall for her house.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es: Evelyn esta divorciada y a cargo de dos hijos Ella vive en La Paz en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es propiedad de sus padres Evelyn se dedica a la venta de comida y quiere mejorar su negocio por lo que necesita un prestamo para comprar una cocina, un parrillero, arroz y fideo para poder incrementar sus ingresos vendiendo mayor cantidad de comida, como ya se acerca la navidad en toda Bolivia se arman ferias callejeras donde tambien se vende comida, esta es una oportunidad que Evelyn no quiere desaprovechar
texts.en: Evelyn is divorced and responsible for two children. She lives in La Paz in a brick and cement house that belongs to her parents. Evelyn works selling food and wants to improve her business, so she needs a loan to purchase a range, a barbecue, rice and beans to be able to increase her income selling a larger quantity of food, since Christmas is coming and all over Bolivia they have street festivals where they also sell food. This is an opportunity that Evelyn doesn't want to miss.

loans.use: to purchase a range, a barbecue, rice and beans.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: Soledad esta casada, tiene dos hijos y por cuestiones economicas esta viviendo con sus suegros (algo que a ella no le gusta mucho) en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento Soledad se dedica al tejido de gorras para niños y tiene una tienda de barrio Soledad quiere un credito para comprar lana y mercaderia para su tienda El esposo de Soledad le ayuda pero tiene que viajar mucho Afortunadamente, la clienta y su familia gozan de buena salud y esperan mejorar su situacion
texts.en: Soledad is married, has two children, and for economic reasons is living with her parents-in-law (something that she doesn't like very much) in El Alto in a brick and cement house. Soledad works knitting hats for children and has a neighborhood store. Soledad wants a loan to purchase wool and merchandise for her store. Soledad's husband helps her but has to travel a lot. Fortunately, the client and her family enjoy good health and want to improve their situation.

loans.use: to purchase wool and merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and metal sheeting to build two walls in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase galvanized corrugated metal, wood, beams, etc. to build a shed to protect his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: wooden boards, corrugated metal roofing, cement and sand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase galvanized corrugated metal and beams to repair the roof on his house.

loans.name: Efia

texts.en: Efia is 23 years old, and she lives with her parents in Kilolo district. She is a Camfed Learner guide volunteering in a secondary school helping students how to overcome the daily challenges that may become an obstacle for their studies and limit their dreams. She is an agriculturist who grows tomatoes and she requires water for her plants. She owns five acres of tomato cropland, and she wants to use her profit to help her parents with their household expenses. Efia is requesting a Kiva loan to expand her farm and buy irrigation machines and use modern technology to plant her tomato seeds throughout the year. Efia believes that this irrigation method will help her obtain more profits, enabling her to grow her business.

loans.use: to expand her farm and buy irrigation machines and use modern technology

loans.name: Los Jardines Group

texts.es:
Consuelo, tiene 48 años de edad, tiene un hijo menor. Ella forma parte del grupo "Los Jardines", que está formado por cinco socias cuyo propósito es hacer crecer sus negocios, lograr una independencia económica y así poder ayudar a cubrir los gastos familiares.
Consuelo de dedica desde hace tres años a la preparación y venta de comida en un espacio adaptado para este negocio en su domicilio, considera que es un trabajo muy sacrificado ya que debe levantarse muy temprano cargar los bultos de las compras luego llegar a cocinar, pero es un sacrificio que la ayuda a sacar a delante a su hijo y la ayuda a sentirse bien teniendo un trabajo independiente.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la preparación de los alimentos que vende, insumos como arroz, azúcar, papa, aceite, etc.
texts.en:
Consuelo is 48 years old and has one young son. She is a member of the "Los Jardines" [The Gardens] lending group, which is made up of five members whose goal is to grow their businesses and achieve financial independence so that they can cover their household expenses.

For the past three years Consuelo has worked preparing and selling food in an area of her house that has been adapted for that purpose. She considers it hard work because she must wake up very early and carry the loads of supplies she buys before she begins cooking, but it is a sacrifice that helps her create a better life for her son, and it also makes her feel good to have her own business.

Consuelo will use the money from this loan to buy food preparation supplies, such as rice, sugar, potatoes, cooking oil, etc.

loans.use: buy supplies for her food sales business.
